column3: the best steak in Chicago. You can harp about Gibsons
column5: Primehouse or RPM all you want
column6: but nothing is going to beat the deep flavor that is so perfectly encapsulated in the prime bone-in dry aged ribeye. Seriously
column7: this is the best steak I've ever had
column8: and I do not say that lightly. Please come prepared for this experience
column9: and please take your time. Such decadence is not to be rushed.
